title: Sneak peek at Disney's new aqua treats
text:
Move over, millennial pink. Peace out purple.

Interested in Disney? Add Disney as an interest to stay up to date on the latest Disney news, video, and analysis from ABC News. Add Interest

The Arendelle Aqua Collection is the latest color collection to hit Disney Parks.

There's going to be a ton of merch, from headwear and accessories to men and women’s apparel.

Disney Parks

But we're most excited about the color-coordinated food.

Disney Parks

We've spotted churros, cookies and popcorn buckets so far.

Disney Parks

Disney Parks

The collection is inspired by the Academy Award-winning animated feature "Frozen," from Walt Disney Animation Studios.

This collection marks the first-ever global release for a color collection, launching on the same day at Disneyland Resort, Walt Disney World Resort, Disneyland Paris, Shanghai Disney Resort, Hong Kong Disneyland and online at shopDisney.com beginning on Sept. 13, 2019.
description: The Arendelle Aqua Collection is the latest color collection to hit Disney Parks.
